moves.notesEN: Forces a juggle state when hitting a mid-air opponent Forces a juggle state when the attack lands as a Punish Counter. Feet are Invincible from frame 8 to frame 15.
moves.notesCN: 命中空中对手造成浮空硬直，确反康造成浮空硬直，8-15帧脚部无敌

moves.notesEN: Can be rapid canceled
moves.notesCN: 可以连击取消

moves.notesEN: Can be rapid canceled
moves.notesCN: 可以连击取消

moves.notesEN: * 3 frames of recovery added when the attack misses
moves.notesCN: 攻击挥空+3f收招

moves.notesEN: Forces the opponent into a standing position This move can be canceled until the 1st active frame.
moves.notesCN: 强制对手站立，第一帧打击帧之前动作可以被取消

moves.notesEN: Knockdown time extended when the attack lands as a Punish Counter, and changes to Hard Knockdown
moves.notesCN: 确反康强制倒地，延长倒地时间

moves.notesEN: Has cross-up attack properties
moves.notesCN: 有逆向判定

moves.notesEN: Forces a juggle state when hitting a mid-air opponent
moves.notesCN: 命中空中对手时造成浮空硬直

moves.notesEN: Has cross-up attack properties
moves.notesCN: 有逆向判定

moves.notesEN: Forces a slam knockdown on counter or Punish Counter when hitting a mid-air opponent
moves.notesCN: 打康或确反康命中空中对手时造成砸地倒地

moves.notesEN: Forces a slam knockdown when hitting a mid-air opponent
moves.notesCN: 命中空中对手时造成砸地倒地

moves.notesEN: 17 frames of advantage added when the attack lands as a Punish Counter. Forces a juggle state when hitting a mid-air opponent
moves.notesCN: 确反康+17f有利，命中空中对手造成浮空硬直

moves.notesEN: * 4 frames of recovery added when the attack misses
moves.notesCN: 攻击挥空+4f收招

moves.nameEN: Fatal Shot (After an OD Sand Blast)
moves.notesEN: Consumes 10000 of the Drive gauge on activation.
moves.notesCN: 额外消耗一格斗气

moves.notesEN: Hold the button for more than 18 frames to change properties Perform the Perfect version by releasing the button between frames 18 - 20
moves.notesCN: 按住按钮18帧以上触发蓄力，蓄力18-20帧时松开按钮触发完美蓄力

moves.notesEN: Clashes with projectiles (Once) Combo scaling added to 2nd hit.
moves.notesCN: 可以抵消波动（一段），上海修正从第二段攻击开始

moves.notesEN: Transitions to 2nd attack on hit Can only be canceled into DDT on the 1st hit
moves.notesCN: 击中对手派生第二段，第一段击中只能取消DDT

moves.notesEN: Consumes 10000 of the Drive gauge on activation.
moves.notesCN: 额外消耗一格斗气

moves.nameEN: Aerial Flash Knuckle (During a neutral or forward jump)
moves.notesEN: *+7 frames of recovery added when whiffing the attack high in the air.
moves.notesCN: 挥空+7f收招

moves.nameEN: Aerial Flash Knuckle(Charged) (During a neutral or forward jump) Hold
OD Aerial Flash Knuckle (During a neutral or forward jump)

moves.notesEN: Can transition to branching attacks from frames 13 - 31
moves.notesCN: 13-31帧可以派生后续

moves.notesEN: Super Armor for 1 attack from frames 3 - 35 Can transition to branching attacks from frames 12 - 31
moves.notesCN: 3-35帧有一段霸体，12-31帧开征后续

moves.notesEN: 5 frames of recovery added when the attack misses
moves.notesCN: 攻击挥空+5f收招

moves.notesEN: Invincible against mid-air projectiles and strikes with mid-air hitboxes from frames 1 - 14 Considered airborne from frames 8 - 36 * Does 800 individual damage from the 3rd active frame and on
moves.notesCN: 1-14帧对空无敌，8-36帧浮空，第三段攻击造成800伤害

moves.notesEN: Invincible against mid-air projectiles and strikes with mid-air hitboxes from frames 1 - 8 Considered airborne from frames 9 - 39 * Does 800 individual damage from the 3rd active frame and on
moves.notesCN: 1-8帧对空无敌，9-39帧浮空，第三段攻击造成800伤害

moves.notesEN: Invincible against mid-air projectiles and strikes with mid-air hitboxes from frames 1 - 9 Considered airborne from frames 11 - 43 * Does 800 individual damage from the 3rd active frame and on
moves.notesCN: 1-9帧对空无敌，11-43帧浮空，第三段攻击造成800伤害

moves.notesEN: Completely invincible from frames 1 - 10 Considered airborne from frames 8 - 50 Can only transition to Slam Dunk on hit
moves.notesCN: 1-10帧无敌，8-50帧浮空，第三段攻击造成800伤害

moves.nameEN: Slam Dunk (After an OD Rising Uppercut)
moves.notesEN: Consumes 10000 of the Drive gauge on activation.
moves.notesCN: 额外消耗一格斗气

moves.notesEN: Invincible to strikes and throws from frames 1 - 6 Minimum guaranteed damage is 30% Values do not change on counter or Punish Counter
moves.notesCN: 1-6帧打投无敌，保底修正30%，伤害不会随打康类型改变

moves.notesEN: Completely invincible from frames 1 - 7 Transitions to full attack after the 2nd hit Minimum guaranteed damage is 40% Values do not change on counter or Punish Counter
moves.notesCN: 1-7帧无敌，只有第二段攻击命中才会过渡到后续攻击，保底修正40%，伤害不会随打康类型改变

moves.notesEN: Start up changes depending on the distance from the opponent When activated from close range Start up is 10 frames, and completely invincible from frames 1 - 13 When activated from furthest possible range Start up is 27 frames, and completely invincible from frames 1 - 13 Minimum guaranteed damage is 50% Values do not change on counter or Punish Counter * Can only be canceled into from special moves
moves.notesCN: 发动帧会根据对手的距离改变，近距离时，10帧发动，1-13帧无敌，最远距离时，发动帧27帧，1-13帧无敌。保底修正50%，伤害不会随打康种类改变，保底修正50%。只能取消必杀

moves.notesEN: Start up changes depending on the distance from the opponent When activated from close range Start up is 10 frames, and completely invincible from frames 1 - 13 When activated from furthest possible range Start up is 27 frames, and completely invincible from frames 1 - 13 Minimum guaranteed damage is 50% Values do not change on counter or Punish Counter * Can only be canceled into from special moves
moves.notesCN: 发动帧会根据对手的距离改变，近距离时，10帧发动，1-13帧无敌，最远距离时，发动帧27帧，1-13帧无敌。保底修正50%，伤害不会随打康种类改变，保底修正50%。只能取消必杀

moves.notesEN: Properties change to the following when the attack lands as a Punish Counter: - Deals 2040 damage - Super Art gauge increases by 4000 - Forces a hard knockdown
moves.notesCN: 投到确反康性质变化：1，伤害增加为2040；2，超级必杀槽增加4000；3，强制倒地

moves.notesEN: Properties change to the following when the attack lands as a Punish Counter: - Deals 2040 damage - Super Art gauge increases by 4000 - Forces a hard knockdown
moves.notesCN: 投到确反康性质变化：1，伤害增加为2040；2，超级必杀槽增加4000；3，强制倒地

moves.notesEN: Invincible to throws from frame 1 to frame 15.
moves.notesCN: 第1-15帧对投无敌

moves.notesEN: Super Armor for 2 hits from frames 1 - 27 Produces a wall splat if the pushback on hit causes the opponent to connect with the stage wall Properties change to the following when the attack lands as a Punish Counter, or after the Super Armor absorbs a hit: - Produces a crumple stun if the opponent is standing on the ground - Forces a spinning knockdown when hitting a mid-air opponent - Super Art gauge increases by 3000
moves.notesCN: 第1-27帧两次打击霸体，版边会造成对手墙崩。打到确反康性质变化：1，会造成对手进入崩防硬直；2，命中浮空对手时浮空硬直时间增加；3，超级必杀槽增加3000

moves.nameEN: Drive Reversal (while blocking): Battering Ram (When blocking or during a successful Drive Parry)
moves.notesEN: Recoverable damage Completely invincible from frames 1 - 22 5 frames of recovery added on hit
moves.notesCN: 伤害为白血，第1-22帧无敌，击中对手增加5f收招

moves.nameEN: Drive Reversal (while recovering): Battering Ram (During knockdown recovery)
moves.notesEN: Recoverable damage Completely invincible on frames 1 - 20 5 frames of recovery added on hit
moves.notesCN: 伤害为白血，第1-20帧无敌，击中对手增加5f收招

moves.notesEN: *1 Can be canceled from the 4th frame via Drive Rush *2 Parry hitbox is extended for as long as the buttons are held Only blocks can be performed during the recovery period Always in Punish Counter state during execution.
moves.notesCN: 1，从第4帧开始能被绿冲取消；2，蓝防判定会随着按钮的时间延长，但是在蓝防的收招动作中仅有格挡能够取消蓝防的收招，在蓝防动作的持续中，只要被攻击命中就必定为确反康

moves.notesEN: Perfect Parry activates when an attack is absorbed on the frame a parry is input, or on the next frame. (For high and overhead attacks, the player must press the direction away from the opponent. For low attacks, down and back) If no direction is inputted the result will be a regular parry with an additional Drive increase of 3000. Fully invincible for 5 frames once recovery is over (invincibility not granted if you continue the parry) The player on the receiving end of a Perfect Parry cannot cancel and is forced into a Punish Counter state until their move is finished
moves.notesCN: 在输入蓝防的当前帧或下一帧被打击时，会触发完美精防，（对上段/中段攻击，需同时输入后，对下段攻击需同时输入下后）。如果没有输入任何方向，则判定为普通蓝防，但额外增加3000点斗气槽回复。完美精防结束后获得5f的无敌帧（如果持续按住蓝防则不获得）。被完美精防的一方在动作结束前不能取消招式，且如果在动作结束前被击中则一定是确反康

moves.notesEN: Perfect Parry activates when an attack is absorbed on the frame a parry is input, or on the next frame No screen freeze occurs. The player on the receiving end of a Perfect Parry cannot cancel and is forced into a Punish Counter state until their move is finished
moves.notesCN: 在输入蓝防的当前帧或下一帧被打击时，会触发完美精防，不会出现屏幕冻结特效，被精防波动的一方不能取消动作，且在动作结束前被命中一定会出确反康

moves.nameEN: Parry Drive Rush (During a Drive Parry)
moves.notesEN: Screen freeze occurs until the 10th frame * Can be canceled into an attack on the 9th frame of the move Can be canceled into actions other than a parry from the 24th frame
moves.notesCN: 第1-10帧出现屏幕冻结特效，第9帧开始能够被攻击动作取消，第24帧开始能被除了蓝防以外的任何动作取消

moves.nameEN: Cancel Drive Rush (While connecting with a special-cancelable move) ( )
moves.notesEN: Screen freeze occurs until the 9th frame * Can be canceled into an attack from the 10th frame of the move Can be canceled into actions other than a parry from the 25th frame
moves.notesCN: 第1-9帧出现屏幕冻结特效，第10帧开始可以被攻击动作取消，第25帧开始可以被除了蓝防以外的任何动作取消
